name: We Descend
description:
We Descend is a top down shooter with randomly generated floors and guns, where you'll fight your way through a multitude of enemies with different abilities.

Programming by: Mikko Anttila

Art by: Shehd Al-hello, Kasper Heino, Rafael Sainio

Music and SFX by: Rafael Sainio, freesound.org

The game was made as a school project, however it may get remade later on if I remain interested in the project.
